title: $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror-mode-htmlembedded
author: tiddlywiki
name: CodeMirror Mode HTML Embedded
description: Embedded HTML highlighting mode for CodeMirror
readme: This plugin adds Syntax Highlighting for Embedded-HTML tiddlers (application/x-aspx, application/x-ejs, application/x-jsp and application/x-erb) to the [[CodeMirror|http://codemirror.net]] text editor. It needs the latest [[CodeMirror plugin|$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror]] to be installed
